# Repair Minor Damage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 173

*As if with the eye of an expert craftsman, your touch draws out a minor dent in the constructâ€™s surface.*

This spell functions like *[[Repair Light Damage (Spell)|repair light damage]],* except that you repair 1 point of damage to a construct.
